Texts.Chs: 我认为，这个建筑还有某些地方我还没有探索到，我是否应该再次探索？
Texts.Eng: I think there was more than meets the eye to this facility. Did I explore it sufficiently, sawblades notwithstanding?

Texts.Chs: 在水下建筑内寻找珍贵的财富。
Texts.Eng: Search the Hydro Distribution Center for great treasure.

Texts.Chs: 这份地图显示出在遥远星球的水底有着某种奇怪的建筑。它显然蕴藏有巨大的宝藏。
Texts.Eng: The map shows me coordinates to an underwater hydro distribution center on a far-off obscure planet. It apparently holds a great treasure.
